records.location_details: Dead body found in Evros River, Evros Area, Greece. Latitude and longitude are unknown.
records.context_note: Hellenic Police Officers patrolling the operational area detected a dead body (male), age between 20-25 years old, in Evros Area. No travel documents were found. The body was transferred to Alexandroupolis hospital for autopsy to determine the cause of death.
records.evidence_quote: Dead body found in Evros River... detected a dead body (male), age betwen 20-25 years old in Evros Area.
